title: [Self-Directed] Blended Learning Simulation Design Consulting for Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theoretical knowledge and practical experience in medical/science fields
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment using smartphone-based VR simulations, where learners primarily participate while balancing fieldwork.

learning_goals: Learners improve decision-making accuracy in complex medical scenarios by over 85% through VR simulations
Participants submit a design plan applying five blended learning principles to real work environments within four weeks
Proposes iterative improvements for three types of learning content based on team-level feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
